description: An action verb defining the kind of flow and its behavior. Includes metadata about effects on inventoried resources.

label.description: The display label for the action.

inputOutput.description: Whether the action is an input or output of a process, or not applicable.

pairsWith.description: The action that usually affects the same resource as a complement in the same flow.

createResource.description: Whether the action can create an economic resource.

eventQuantity.description: Whether the event uses resource quantity, effort quantity, or both.

accountingEffect.description: The effect on the accounting quantity of an inventoried resource.

onhandEffect.description: The effect on the onhand quantity of an inventoried resource.

locationEffect.description: The effect on an inventoried resource's current location.

containedEffect.description: The effect on an inventoried resource's containment.

accountableEffect.description: The effect on the primary accountable agent of an inventoried resource.

stageEffect.description: The effect on an inventoried resource's stage.

stateEffect.description: The effect on an inventoried resource's state.
